mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Dick,
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Granville, Delaware Co., Indiana [Granville, Delaware County, Indiana]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Dick, Patient Age: 25. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Convalescent from erysipelas . Result: Deserted 1865/05/08. Was with Florance Bishop and assisted in committing a rape on a woman Mrs. Pompry.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Dick,
Convalescent from erysipelas
Private
B
147 [147th Indiana Infantry? - see administrative notes]
